decisions.description: Email alert if opportunity has been edited by distributors (only APAC)

rules.name: Opp_Inform_Owner_if_Opp_edited_by_distributor

decisions.description: Email notification to both Account and Opportunity Owners when they are different
decisions.name: Opp_Owner_different_from_Account_Owner_Decision
decisions.label: Opp: Owner different from Account Owner Decision

rules.name: Opp_Owner_different_from_Account_Owner
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4) AND 5 AND (6 OR 7) AND 8
rules.label: Opp: Owner different from Account Owner

decisions.name: Opp_Owner_different_from_Account_Owner_Decision_for_Partner_Portal
decisions.label: Opp: Owner different from Account Owner Decision for Partner Portal

rules.name: Opp_Owner_different_from_Account_Owner_Decision_Partner_Portal
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4) AND 5 AND (6 OR 7) AND 8
rules.label: Opp: Owner different from Account Owner Decision Partner Portal

decisions.description: When opportunity is created or updated, send an alert to a group of people
decisions.name: Opportunity_alert_for_JODY_W1_and_THEO_P1_Decision
decisions.label: Opportunity: alert for JODY-W1 and THEO-P1 Decision

rules.name: Opportunity_alert_for_JODY_W1_and_THEO_P1
rules.conditionLogic: (1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7 or 8 or 9 or 10) AND (11 OR 12) AND 13
rules.label: Opportunity: alert for JODY-W1 and THEO-P1

decisions.description: When field "Send mail with opportunity information" is checked, send mail with main information to owner.
decisions.name: Opportunity_send_mail_with_information_Decision
decisions.label: Opportunity: send mail with information Decision

decisions.description: Chatter Post on Opportunity update of these products, updated with custom domain
decisions.name: Post_to_Chatter_Decision
decisions.label: Post to Chatter Decision

rules.name: Product_1_EMMY_W_OR_JODY_W
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 8 AND 9 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Product 1: EMMY-W OR JODY-W

rules.name: Product_2_EMMY_W_OR_JODY_W
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 8 AND 9 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Product 2: EMMY-W OR JODY-W

rules.name: Product_3_EMMY_W_OR_JODY_W
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 8 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Product 3: EMMY-W OR JODY-W

decisions.description: Send Approval/Denial email notices for Future Americas.
decisions.name: Send_Email_to_Future_Americas_Decision
decisions.label: Send Email to Future Americas Decision

formulas.name: Opp_Inform_Owner_if_Opp_edited_by_distributor_Criteria
formulas.expression: AND( OR( {!Record.Product_1__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Product_1__c}, {!Record.Product_2__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Product_2__c}, {!Record.Product_3__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Product_3__c}, {!Record.Latest_Status__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Latest_Status__c}, {!Record.Decision_Date__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Decision_Date__c}, {!Record.Proto_Date__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Proto_Date__c}, {!Record.CloseDate} <> {!RecordPrior.CloseDate}, Text({!Record.StageName}) <> Text({!RecordPrior.StageName}) ), {!Record.LastModifiedBy.Profile.Name} = "Partner Base", {!Record.LastModifiedById} <> {!Record.OwnerId}, NOT( OR( Text({!Record.Account.uB_Office__c}) = "Americas", Text({!Record.Account.uB_Office__c}) = "EMEA" ) ) )

formulas.name: Opp_Inform_Owner_if_Opp_edited_by_distributor_Criteria_for_Partner_Portal
formulas.expression: AND( OR( {!Record.Product_1__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Product_1__c}, {!Record.Product_2__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Product_2__c}, {!Record.Product_3__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Product_3__c}, {!Record.Latest_Status__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Latest_Status__c}, {!Record.Decision_Date__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Decision_Date__c}, {!Record.Proto_Date__c} <> {!RecordPrior.Proto_Date__c}, {!Record.CloseDate} <> {!RecordPrior.CloseDate}, Text({!Record.StageName}) <> Text({!RecordPrior.StageName}) ), {!Record.LastModifiedBy.Profile.Name} = "Portal - Partner Base", {!Record.LastModifiedById} <> {!Record.OwnerId}, NOT( OR( Text({!Record.Account.uB_Office__c}) = "Americas", Text({!Record.Account.uB_Office__c}) = "EMEA" ) ) )

formulas.name: Post_to_Marketing_Management_Message

textTemplates.name: MarketingManagementMessage
Product1EMMY_WORJODY_WMessage
Product2EMMY_WORJODY_WMessage
Product3EMMY_WORJODY_WMessage

variables.description: Product 1: EMMY-W OR JODY-W Product 2: EMMY-W OR JODY-W Product 3: EMMY-W OR JODY-W
variables.name: ProductEMMY_W_OR_JODY_W
